Uses of Interface
fr.sii.ogham.core.builder.mimetype.TikaBuilder

  • Packages that use TikaBuilder 
    Package Description
    fr.sii.ogham.core.builder.mimetype  

    • Uses of TikaBuilder in fr.sii.ogham.core.builder.mimetype

      Classes in fr.sii.ogham.core.builder.mimetype that implement TikaBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  SimpleTikaBuilder<P>
      Instantites and configures the TikaProvider: If a custom Tika instance has been provided, then use it directly If no custom Tika instance has been provided, then use the default one: new Tika() (see TikaConfig.getDefaultConfig()) Tika may be in some conditions not enough accurate.
      class  TikaBuilderDelegate<P>
      Implementation that just delegates all operations to another builder.
      Methods in fr.sii.ogham.core.builder.mimetype that return TikaBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TikaBuilder<P> TikaBuilder.failIfOctetStream(boolean fail)
      If Tika detection returns an application/octet-stream, it may means that detection was not enough accurate.
      TikaBuilder<P> SimpleTikaBuilder.failIfOctetStream(boolean fail) 
      TikaBuilder<P> TikaBuilder.instance(org.apache.tika.Tika tika)
      Provide custom Tika instance.
      TikaBuilder<P> SimpleTikaBuilder.instance(org.apache.tika.Tika tika) 
      TikaBuilder<MimetypeDetectionBuilder<P>> MimetypeDetectionBuilder.tika()
      Enable mimetype detection using Apache Tika.
      TikaBuilder<MimetypeDetectionBuilder<P>> SimpleMimetypeDetectionBuilder.tika() 
      TikaBuilder<MimetypeDetectionBuilder<P>> MimetypeDetectionBuilderDelegate.tika() 
      Constructors in fr.sii.ogham.core.builder.mimetype with parameters of type TikaBuilder 
      Constructor and Description
      TikaBuilderDelegate(P parent, TikaBuilder<?> delegate)
      Wraps the delegate builder.
